message.body: Hey! Just wanted to let you know that my mom is friends with a black woman at work who has decided to introduce my mom to "black people movies." So my mom is hosting "why did I get married?" tomorrow night at 6 and you're invited. Have fun at the b-ette p
We can pick you up, if you like! My mom would love to see your house (she says she doesn't care if it's messy)!
Okay! Yes, picking me up would be great. Downtown is not far from me. Be here at 1?
Sounds good! What's your address again?
